name: Demand And Supply
description:
OVERVIEW:

I didn't make the #kenneyJam that took place a week before, but I was still interested in getting this project to completion. The theme of the Jam was "Rotation".

Main rules: Use only the assets available on the kenney.nl website.

HOW TO PLAY:

Click on corner pieces on the highway hovering above the void. This rotates them. Direct the trucks to the warehouses to get cash. You get bonus points for delivering the green flaming trucks to the warehouses. 

If you a regular truck falls into the void, you loose a life. Lose all 3... it's gameover man.

POWERUPS:

  • Wireless Processing - all trucks are delivered to the warehouses instantly
  • Slow Down The Trucks - slows down the speed of trucks temporarily
  • Triple the money - Triples the money of courese :)
  • [Developer Mode] - You don't loose a life if regular trucks fall into the void
  • Extra Life - Gain an extra life
  • Battle Zero Gravity - Trucks are not influenced by gravity.... temporarily

Also available on gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/demand_and_supply/642205
